topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) 1.1: Undercloud Horizon Overview
topic.body:
# HP Helion OpenStack® 1.1: Undercloud Horizon Overview [See the Helion OpenStack 1.0 version of this page](/helion/openstack/undercloud/horizon/overview/) Once you complete the undercloud and the overcloud installations, you can access the undercloud Horizon dashboard, which is the management interface for the undercloud.
##Dashboard Features
The Horizon Dashboard displays the Overview page by default, and provides options in the left panel.
There are additional options located under the following tabs:
* **Admin** * **Project** * **Resources** * **Overcloud**
The name of the user (who is logged in) is shown on the top bar along with a drop-down menu.
Return to Top ↑
